name: Small Dungeon
description:
A challenging turn based game where you must navigate your way through a mysterious dungeon.  Fight enemies, collect treasure and try to survive long enough to make your escape.

Features
- 20 levels
- Multiple difficulty settings
- Configurable control options
- Gamepad and Keyboard Support

How to Play
- Arrow keys to move
- Space button to pass a turn

- Controls remappable in game
